text: When you get a #COVID19 #vaccine, sign up for @CDCgov’s V-Safe to monitor any side effects. You’ll get 1 text/d the 1st wk, then 1/wk for the next 5 wks, & at 3, 6, 12 mos w/ 30 secs of Qs. Very simple, & we keep learning. Text STOP anytime. #VaccinesWork https://t.co/qXlvyzNe3e https://t.co/N0v4MjQO17
